if you connect to the VPN then run:  ifconfig   look at the address, are both on the same subnet (look at the first 3 numbers in the IP addresses)
most likely not. So if they are not, what do i do?

they NEED to be different, if the VPN address (for example) is 192.168.0.x and your LAN IP also uses 192.168.0.x then there is zero differentiation between the networks and youwill need to change the address network of YOUR network to something else (like 192.168.1.x)
